Package com.jidesoft.colormap

Provides the necessary classes and interfaces for mapping values to colors.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ColorMap This interface defines how values can be mapped to colors.
ColorMapListener The listener interface for receiving "interesting" events about changes to the colormap.
MutableColorMap Defines the requirements for a colormap that can change.
 

Class Summary
AbstractColorMap This class provides a skeletal implementation of the ColorMap interface to minimize the effort required to implement this interface.
ColorMapEvent An event that characterizes a change in the colormap.
ColorMapFactory Factory class for creating ColorMap of different types.
SimpleColorMap Default data model for color maps.
 

Enum Summary
ColorMap.Assignments  
ColorMap.Matching  
 

Package com.jidesoft.colormap Description

Provides the necessary classes and interfaces for mapping values to colors.
